statements: DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 AND patient_gender = 'M';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer' OR (patient_age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 AND treatment = 'Surgery');
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 AND condition = 'Diabetes';
DELETE FROM healthcare_outcomes WHERE outcome_type='positive' AND outcome_value='recovered';
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id=101 AND email='researcher@example.com';
DELETE FROM doctors WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM patient_doctor WHERE doctor_id = 5 AND patient_id = 3;
